title: Romance with Skull Candy and Roller-Skates: She was Perfect except she was Obsessed with Yoga Pants, Roller-Skates, and her EX!
description: For Heather, being in love with her man isn't doing her any favors but causing her massive abuse   That Beefhead comes ripe with relationship mishaps and some other strange yet sexy happenings. See for yourself as the former model and current lawyer turned pen-wielder serves up a dose of her strange literary romances.
author: Emme Hor
